message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CL

This paper proposes an algorithm for recommendation systems, which involves clustering users based on content and utilizing exploration-exploitation strategies. This suggests that the paper could fall under several sub-categories, including machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), social and information networks (cs.SI), and computational linguistics (cs.CL). However, given the focus on clustering and prediction performance, cs.LG and cs.IR are the most likely sub-categories.
